subject: Re: Nardi Plumbing - Hot Water Heaters - Page Issue
preview: Closing the ticket for now while waiting for their response.

full_threads.body: Closing the ticket for now while waiting for their response.

Hi Luca,

We appreciate your prompt response.

No worries! Here's the Figma file you can access:
👉Figma link

Response for the forms on the online enquiry - I believe we have sent this to you before. Can you confirm if this is what you're looking for? If not, please do let us know the specific response you are looking for—happy to check on it for you.
👉https://prnt.sc/CquxvbdcA1Gc

API key - You may also provide us with the Brevo access so we can directly assist you with its integration.

Furthermore, feel free to let us know if you have any questions or need anything from us in the meantime.

Thanks team,

i can't access the figma file at all - it won't come up anymore for me on the figma app, any chance we can be reshared?

thank you - the website looks up to date now on my end,

i just wanted to get a copy of the response for the forms on the online enquiry so we can edit the reply email & the prompt once the form is filled out on the website.

as for the API key, not sure where to find it - ill have a look, otherwise if access to brevo is given is this something you may be able to assist with?

Warm Regards,

Luca Leonardi

Hi Luca,

We really appreciate your prompt response and for bringing some points to our attention.

Here's our updates/answers to your queries:

  1. Can you please adjust the footer as now it is not in alignment
    • This is now fixed. Kindly check and let us know if that's all good on your end.
  2. Could we also have access to the Figma design
    • Can you confirm if you meant the Figma design we forwarded you previously? It looks like you still have access to it. Can you confirm which Figma link/file you don't have access to anymore?
  3. We also have brevo now as a CRM, we will need to integrate this somehow with the online enquiry form to be able to capture details
    • We're happy to assist you in this. Are you able to provide us with the API key so we can assist with the integration?

Looking forward to your feedback very soon.

Thank you team

Can you please adjust the footer as now it is not in alignment

Could we also have access to the Figma design

We also have brevo now as a CRM, we will need to integrate this somehow with the online enquiry form to be able to capture details

Warm Regards,

Luca Leonardi

Hi Luca,

Hope you are having a lovely Monday!

Our apologies for any inconvenience this has caused you.

Rest assured, the Hot Water Heaters page was already fixed with the new template and has been live since the end of August. Here's the working link below:

👉https://nardiplumbing.com.au/services/hot-water-heaters/

The link to the footer is now updated and should show the updated page.

Kindly check and let us know if that's all good on your end.

Always happy to help if you have any further queries.

Hi team

Confirming this has been sorted?

Saw it still hasn't been actioned and have been waiting a while for this one

If you're too busy for our work please let me know and we will go elsewhere

See screenshot attached to show works not completed



Warm Regards,

Luca Leonardi

thanks team

could this be redesigned to the current template and published.

also could we please see the response template for the online enquiries?

Warm Regards,

Looping in for Allie - I can see that your concern is regarding the Hot Water Heaters page not showing.

Upon checking, this page seems to be drafted on the backend. A page in "Draft" cannot be viewed by the public users. See the screenshot below:

This is the preview from the backend.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Joy T

full_threads.body:
Hi Kosta,

Thanks so much for the heads-up, and for sharing the screenshot!

Here’s what we found:
  • There are two similar pages in the backend for Hot Water Heaters
  • The version appears to be using a different template
  • We also spotted this draft version that looks ready to go:
    👉 Preview draft page

Quick question:
  • Should we go ahead and publish the draft above?
  • Or should we use hot water heaters instead
    • https://nardiplumbing.com.au/?post_type=service&p=2441&preview=true

Just let us know what works best and we’ll jump on it. All sorted on our end once we get your go-ahead!
